ValidationRule.description: Prevents invalid suffix values from being entered in the text suffix field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Suffix)), NOT( OR( Suffix = ", Jr.", Suffix = ", Sr.", Suffix = "III", Suffix = "I", Suffix = "II", Suffix = "IV", Suffix = "V", Suffix = "VI", Suffix = "VII", Suffix = "VIII", Suffix = "IX", Suffix = "X"
) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A valid suffix value has not been entered.
